body.name: Bed Guard Rail for Toddlers - 32" Toddler Bed Rails for Queen, Full, King, Twin, Crib, Bunk Size Bed Adjustable Heights & Folding up Bedrail,with Reinforced Sturdy Bed Rail Guard (Beige)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 10 mins
features: 【"Hidden" One-Click Button Folding Design】Omzer toddler bed rails feature a one-click button for effortless folding. When the baby sleeps at night,the kids bed rail can be lifted up for safety protection,and when the bed rail is not used during the day,the bed rail for toddlers can be folded up without taking up space or affecting the upper and lower beds. It's quiet when you lower or raise the toddler bed rail,so no waking up my toddler!

【Unpicky Mattress Height & Adjustable Heights Design】The bed guard rails are designed with adjustable heights to accommodate most thicknesses of mattresses. Bed rail toddler can be safely installed on any bed,from cribs,toddler beds, single beds to double beds. Our baby bed rail is designed for infants transitioning from a crib to a regular standard bed. The toddler bed rail guard has designed to be the perfect height to protect your child from rolling over in bed and getting accidentally injured.

【Larger Force Area & Rugged U-Shape Design】The bed guardrail base has a U-shaped design,which provides a larger area of force and is less likely to slip. The toddler bed rail guard can be used as long as it is placed under the mattress,no additional tools are needed and no modifications to the flat bed or bedspring are required. To make our guardrails even more stable,our bed rail for toddlers also include reinforcement straps to hold them in place. This bed rail for baby gives you peace of mind when your baby is sleeping.

【Easy Installation & Convenient Cleaning】The toddler bed rail guard consists of the following main components: base, bracket, upper crossbar,lower crossbar and bed rail cover,just splice each section of connecting tube together and follow the instructions in the operation manual,the toddler safety bed rail can be installed in a few minutes without using any extra tools. The child bed safety rail is made of high quality,comfortable and breathable mesh. The baby bed guard cover can be easily removed, providing more convenience for cleaning.

【Quality Assurance & After-Sales Worry-Free】Omzer is a professional expert in baby bed rail,our bed rail guard only use safe and environmentally friendly materials. The materials used in the bed rail toddler are made according to international safety standards, the toddler bed guard rail do not contain any harmful substances, just to ensure the healthy growth of children. If you have any questions about our bed rail for toddlers, please contact customer service first, we will give you a satisfactory answer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toddler bed transition
reviews.reviewText: Love the color so it matches our wood bed nicely. Super easy to assemble and feels sturdy. The buttons on the front allow it to fold over for easy entry. The base wasn’t quite long enough to stay in place with my kids bouncing in bed with it but we used zip ties to attach it to the bed springs and it did the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As you can see in the picture, there must be a missing part because there is no way the base fits.I had purchased a smaller version earlier, and one of the metal pieces practically had to be hammered in because it didn't fit correctly.Now to spend time on trying to get the correct base pieces. Ugh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t receive item as pictured
reviews.reviewText: This was missing parts and didn’t even resemble the item pictured. However the replacement that was sent was exactly as ordered!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What It’s Meant For
reviews.reviewText: This was an easy set up and helps just the way it’s supposed to. Saved our adventurous, crawling baby several times already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps baby safe from rolling off bed
reviews.reviewText: The railing is a great product to keep baby safe from rolling over off the bed when napping. I don’t have to sit and watch i can now have some free time to myself while feeling confident that my baby will be safe from falling. The only thing is I would say there should be a little more detail with the instructions, just to simplify the set up. Overall 5 stars, it serves the purpose it’s intended for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bed rail for active little ones!
reviews.reviewText: I love this bed rail! It was so easy and quick to put together. We are using this on our bed while our baby is small, and will definitely move it to her toddler bed when she’s older. I like how you can fold it down and out of your way and the height is adjustable for thicker mattresses. Feels very sturdy.
